title: Ticket #4869: Unable to restart ProcD in ShadowLog
description:
We are seeing frequent cases of the following: 

02/05/15 09:38:04 ** PID = 11921
02/05/15 09:38:06 (117967.66) (11921): Request to run on glidein_124437_293271930@wn221.datagrid.cea.fr <192.54.207.101:49039?CCBID=128.142.141.17:9824#101681%20128.142.141.24:9824#97995&noUDP> was ACCEPTED
02/05/15 09:38:12 (117967.66) (11921): File transfer completed successfully.
02/05/15 12:05:46 (117967.66) (11921): ERROR "Error from glidein_124437_293271930@wn221.datagrid.cea.fr: unable to restart the ProcD after several tries" at line 558 in file /slots/03/dir_59220/userdir/src/condor_shadow.V6.1/pseudo_ops.cpp

It's not clear why, but glidein-based condor_procds appear to be somewhat problematic (appears to be at the <1% level). More logs as we discover them - but certainly a better log message would be a start.
creator: bbockelm
